query.comment: getting all the employees in current assignment period
query.name: EMPVIEW-ACTIVE-EMPS

hibernate-mapping.query: select distinct prd.employee from EmployeeView empview left join empview.assignment as prd where (sysdate between empview.fromDate and empview.toDate or (empview.toDate is null and empview.fromDate<=sysdate)) and upper(empview.isPrimary)='Y' and empview.employeeCode like ? order by 17

query.comment: getting the employees for the depts in current assignment period
query.name: EMPVIEW-ACTIVE-EMPS-BYLOGGEDINUSER

hibernate-mapping.query: select distinct empview.assignment.employee from EmployeeView empview left join empview.deptId as department where (sysdate between empview.fromDate and empview.toDate or (empview.toDate is null and empview.fromDate<=sysdate)) and upper(empview.isPrimary)='Y' and empview.employeeCode like ? and department.id in (:param_1)

query.comment: getting the employees for the depts in current/last assignment period
query.name: EMPVIEW-EMPS-BYLOGGEDINUSER

hibernate-mapping.query: select distinct empview.assignment.employee from EmployeeView empview left join empview.deptId as department where upper(empview.isPrimary)='Y' and empview.employeeCode like ? and (sysdate between empview.fromDate and empview.toDate or (empview.toDate is null and empview.fromDate<=sysdate) or empview.fromDate=(SELECT MAX(ev.fromDate) from EmployeeView ev where ( ev.toDate <= sysdate and (sysdate not between ev.fromDate and ev.toDate or (ev.toDate is null and ev.fromDate <=sysdate))) and upper(ev.isPrimary)='Y' and ev.employeeCode like ?)) and department.id in (:param_2)

query.comment: getting the employees in current/last assignment period
query.name: EMPVIEW-EMPS-LASTASSPRD

hibernate-mapping.query: select distinct empview.assignment.employee from EmployeeView empview where upper(empview.isPrimary)='Y' and empview.employeeCode like ? and (sysdate between empview.fromDate and empview.toDate or (empview.toDate is null and empview.fromDate<=sysdate) or empview.fromDate=(SELECT MAX(ev.fromDate) from EmployeeView ev where ( ev.toDate <= sysdate and (sysdate not between ev.fromDate and ev.toDate or (ev.toDate is null and ev.fromDate <=sysdate))) and upper(ev.isPrimary)='Y' and ev.employeeCode like ?)) order by 17

sql-query.comment: get the depts for the logged in user current
sql-query.name: EMPVIEW-DEPTIDS-LOGGEDINUSER

hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select distinct egdept.deptid from eg_employee_dept egdept, eg_emp_assignment ass,eg_employee emp where sysdate between ass.from_date and prd.to_date and ass.ID_EMPLOYEE = emp.ID and egdept.assignment_id=ass.id and emp.id_user = ? union select distinct ass.main_dept from eg_emp_assignment ass,eg_employee_dept egdept, eg_employee emp where sysdate between ass.from_date and ass.to_date and ass.ID_EMPLOYEE = emp.ID and emp.id_user = ?
